title: Does Trump consider pardoning troublemakers in the Capitol?
subtitle: It's assumed that the Acting Amnesty Attorney of Trump's administration made the announcement in Barler's position.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: The Acting Advocate Rosalind Sargent-Berns wrote in an article to Barler that US President Donald Trump was considering pardoning his supporters who faced criminal charges in the Capitol rebellion on 6 January 2021.
